definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

pinyin: yuan2 shi3 re4 dai4 yu3 lin2

sentences.english: Yet a third tropical wave is east of the Lesser Antilles.
sentences.chinese: 然而，第三个热带波在小安的列斯群岛东面。

sentences.english: The dirt roads were, at times, impassible because of the heavy tropical rains.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，热带暴雨让泥路无法行走。

sentences.english: The Maldives comprises the equator and has a tropical climate.
sentences.chinese: 马尔代夫位于赤道附近，属热带气候。

sentences.english: The Formosan landlocked salmon is the only salmon to live in a subtropical region.
sentences.chinese: 台湾的樱花钩吻鲑是唯一生活在亚热带的鲑鱼。

sentences.english: The storm is under the influence of STR.
sentences.chinese: 风暴正受副热带高压脊的影响。

sentences.english: These clothes aren't really suited to a tropical climate.
sentences.chinese: 在热带气候区这种衣服实在不合适。

sentences.english: I read from a book that the climate in New Orleans is semitropical.
sentences.chinese: 我看过一本书说新奥尔良属于亚热带气候。

sentences.english: Some tropical rhododendrons on the back like wings, like the rainbow blue.
sentences.chinese: 有些热带杜鹃的背上翅膀上有像彩虹一样的蓝色。

sentences.english: Clear green in the summer to make use of tropical iced tea, excellent refreshing effect.
sentences.chinese: 在夏季用热带清绿来制作冰茶，极佳的提神效果。

sentences.english: American honeymoon couples love their tropical beach honeymoons.
sentences.chinese: 美国新人比较喜欢热带海滩蜜月之旅。

sentences.english: The tropical plants thrived well under our care.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的照料下，这些热带植物茁壮生长。

sentences.english: A soft mouth-feel with creaminess and crisp tropical fruit flavors.
sentences.chinese: 清爽的热带果味与乳脂般的柔和口感达到完美平衡。

sentences.english: You can't be too careful when you visit the rainforest.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们要去热带雨林我们不能不特别谨严。

sentences.english: Distributing all over the world intertropical , the selva area with South America is most.
sentences.chinese: 分布在全世界的热带，以南美洲的热带雨林地区最多。

sentences.english: Distributing all over the world intertropical , the selva area with South America is most.
sentences.chinese: 分布在全世界的热带，以南美洲的热带雨林地区最多。

sentences.english: Cocona fruit is another tropical fruit found in the mountainous regions of South America.
sentences.chinese: 可可果是在南美洲山区发现的别一种热带水果。

pinyin: Ma3 da2 jia1 si1 jia1 Dao3

definition: Arecaceae or Palmae, the palm family
Hainan Island in South China Sea

pinyin: yuan2 shi3 re4 dai4 yu3 lin2
